00028 typedef struct
00029 {
00030   void (*callback)(eolGraphicsView info);
00031 }eolGraphicsCallback;
00032 
00033 typedef struct
00034 {
00035   eolBool           trackFPS;     
00036   eolBool           fullScreen;   
00037   eolDouble         scaleFactor;  
00039   eolUint           frameDelay;   
00041   eolGraphicsView   graphicsView; 
00042 }eolGraphicsConfig;
00043 
00044 /* internal globals. DO NOT EXTERN OUTSIDE OF THIS FILE!*/
00045 eolBool             _eolGraphicsInitialized = eolFalse;
00046 eolGraphicsConfig   _eolGraphicsConfig;
00047 SDL_Surface       * _eol_videobuffer = NULL;
00048 SDL_PixelFormat   * _eol_pixelFormat = NULL; 
00049 GList             * _eol_resize_callbacks = NULL;
00050 eolFloat            _eol_graphics_FPS = 0;   /*calculated Frames per second*/
00051 eolUint             _eol_graphics_NOW = 0;

00061 /*function definitions*/
00062 void eol_graphics_config()
00063 {
00064   eolConfig *conf = NULL;
00065   _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.depth = 32;
00066   _eolGraphicsConfig.trackFPS = eolTrue;
00067   _eolGraphicsConfig.fullScreen = 0; 
00068   _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.openGLOn = 1;
00069   _eolGraphicsConfig.scaleFactor = 1;
00070   _eolGraphicsConfig.frameDelay = 16;
00071   _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.xRes = 640;
00072   _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.yRes = 480;
00073   _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.mipmapping = eolFalse;
00074   #if SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN
00075   _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.rMask = 0xff000000;
00076   _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.gMask = 0x00ff0000;
00077   _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.bMask = 0x0000ff00;
00078   _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.aMask = 0x000000ff;
00079   #else
00080   _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.rMask = 0x000000ff;
00081   _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.gMask = 0x0000ff00;
00082   _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.bMask = 0x00ff0000;
00083   _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.aMask = 0xff000000;
00084   #endif
00085   conf = eol_config_load("system/graphics.cfg");
00086   if (conf == NULL)return;
00087   eol_config_get_uint_by_tag(&_eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.depth,conf,"bitdepth");
00088   eol_config_get_uint_by_tag(&_eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.xRes,conf,"x_resolution");
00089   eol_config_get_uint_by_tag(&_eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.yRes,conf,"y_resolution");
00090   eol_config_get_uint_by_tag(&_eolGraphicsConfig.frameDelay,conf,"frameDelay");
00091   eol_config_get_bool_by_tag(&_eolGraphicsConfig.fullScreen,conf,"fullScreen");
00092   eol_config_get_bool_by_tag(&_eolGraphicsConfig.trackFPS,conf,"trackFPS");
00093   eol_config_get_bool_by_tag(&_eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.mipmapping,conf,"mipmapping");
00094   eol_config_get_bool_by_tag(&_eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.openGLOn,conf,"openGLOn");
00095   eol_config_free(&conf);
00096 }
00097 
00098 void setup_default_fog()
00099 {
00100 
00101 float fogcolor[] = {0.75,0.50,4,1};
00102 glEnable(GL_FOG);
00103 glFogfv(GL_FOG_COLOR,fogcolor);
00104 glFogi(GL_FOG_MODE, GL_EXP);
00105 glFogf(GL_FOG_DENSITY, 0.001f);
00106 glFogf(GL_FOG_START, 1.0f);
00107 glFogf(GL_FOG_END, 200.0f);
00108 }

00110 
00111 void eol_graphics_init()
00112 {
00113   eolInt x,y;
00114 
00115   eolUint Vflags = SDL_ANYFORMAT | SDL_SRCALPHA;
00116   eolUint HWflag = 0;
00117   eol_logger_message(
00118       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00119       "eol_graphics: initializing\n");
00120   x = _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.xRes;
00121   y = _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.yRes;
00122   if(_eolGraphicsConfig.fullScreen)Vflags |= SDL_FULLSCREEN;
00123   if(_eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.openGLOn)Vflags |= SDL_OPENGL;
00124   
00125   
00126   #if defined(_WIN32)
00127   stream = freopen("stdout.txt", "w", stdout);
00128   stream = freopen("stderr.txt", "w", stderr);
00129   #endif
00130   
00131   if (SDL_Init(SDL_INIT_AUDIO|SDL_INIT_VIDEO | SDL_INIT_JOYSTICK | SDL_DOUBLEBUF) < 0 )
00132   {
00133     eol_logger_message(
00134         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00135         "eol_graphics: Unable to init SDL: %s\n", SDL_GetError());
00136     exit(1);
00137   }
00138   atexit(SDL_Quit);
00139   
00140   if(SDL_VideoModeOK(x, y, 32, Vflags | SDL_HWSURFACE))
00141   {
00142     _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.xRes = x;
00143     _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.yRes = y;
00144     _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.depth = 32;
00145     HWflag = SDL_HWSURFACE;
00146     
00147     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_RED_SIZE, 8);
00148     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_GREEN_SIZE, 8);
00149     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_BLUE_SIZE, 8);
00150     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_DEPTH_SIZE, 24);
00151     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_DOUBLEBUFFER, 1);
00152     
00153   }
00154   else if(SDL_VideoModeOK(x + 6, y, 32, Vflags | SDL_HWSURFACE))
00155   {
00156     _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.xRes = x + 6;
00157     _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.yRes = y;
00158     _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.depth = 32;
00159     HWflag = SDL_HWSURFACE;
00160     
00161     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_RED_SIZE, 8);
00162     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_GREEN_SIZE, 8);
00163     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_BLUE_SIZE, 8);
00164     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_DEPTH_SIZE, 24);
00165     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_DOUBLEBUFFER, 1);
00166     
00167   }
00168   else if(SDL_VideoModeOK(x, y, 32, Vflags))
00169   {
00170     _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.xRes = x;
00171     _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.yRes = y;
00172     _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.depth = 32;
00173     
00174     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_RED_SIZE, 8);
00175     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_GREEN_SIZE, 8);
00176     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_BLUE_SIZE, 8);
00177     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_DEPTH_SIZE, 24);
00178     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_DOUBLEBUFFER, 1);
00179   }
00180   else if(SDL_VideoModeOK(x + 6, y, 32, Vflags))
00181   {
00182     _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.xRes = x + 6;
00183     _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.yRes = y;
00184     _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.depth = 32;
00185     
00186     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_RED_SIZE, 8);
00187     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_GREEN_SIZE, 8);
00188     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_BLUE_SIZE, 8);
00189     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_DEPTH_SIZE, 24);
00190     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_DOUBLEBUFFER, 1);
00191   }
00192   else if(SDL_VideoModeOK(x + 6, y, 32, Vflags))
00193   {
00194     _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.xRes = x + 6;
00195     _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.yRes = y;
00196     _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.depth = 32;
00197     Vflags &= ~SDL_FULLSCREEN;
00198     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_RED_SIZE, 8);
00199     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_GREEN_SIZE, 8);
00200     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_BLUE_SIZE, 8);
00201     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_DEPTH_SIZE, 24);
00202     SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_DOUBLEBUFFER, 1);
00203   }
00204   else
00205   {
00206     eol_logger_message(
00207         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00208         "Unable to use your screen: %s\n Deepest apologies \n", SDL_GetError());
00209     exit(1);
00210   }
00211   _eol_videobuffer = SDL_SetVideoMode(
00212       _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.xRes,
00213       _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.yRes,
00214       _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.depth,
00215       Vflags | HWflag);
00216   if ( _eol_videobuffer == NULL )
00217   {
00218     eol_logger_message(
00219         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00220         "Unable to set video mode: %s\n", SDL_GetError());
00221     exit(1);
00222   }
00223   _eol_pixelFormat = _eol_videobuffer->format;
00224   /*sets the viewing port to the size of the videobuffer*/
00225   glViewport(0,0,_eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.xRes, _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.yRes);
00226   glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00227   glLoadIdentity();
00228   /*view angle, aspect ratio, near clip distance, far clip distance*/
00229   /*TODO: put near/far clip in graphics view config*/
00230   gluPerspective( 40, (eolDouble)x / (eolDouble)y, .01, 2000.0f);
00231   glMatrixMode( GL_MODELVIEW );
00232   glLoadIdentity();
00233   /*Clear color for the buffer*/
00234   glClearColor(0,0,0,0);
00235   /*Enables drawing pixels according to thier depth*/
00236   glDepthFunc(GL_LESS);
00237   glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00238   /*Enables alpha testing*/
00239   glAlphaFunc(GL_GREATER,0);
00240   glEnable(GL_ALPHA_TEST);
00241   glHint(GL_PERSPECTIVE_CORRECTION_HINT, GL_NICEST);
00242   
00243   /*now record the matrix view data*/
00244   glGetIntegerv(GL_VIEWPORT,_eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.viewPort);
00245   glGetDoublev(GL_MODELVIEW_MATRIX, _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.modelView);
00246   glGetDoublev(GL_PROJECTION_MATRIX, _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.projection);
00247 
00248   
00249   _eolGraphicsInitialized = eolTrue;
00250   atexit(eol_graphics_exit);
00251   setup_default_fog();
00252   eol_logger_message(
00253       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00254       "eol_graphics: initialized\n"
00255   );
00256 }
00257 
00258 eolBool eol_graphics_initialized()
00259 {
00260   return _eolGraphicsInitialized;
00261 }

00263 eolUint eol_index_color(eolUint color)
00264 {
00265   switch(color)
00266   {
00267     case Eol_Red:
00268       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,138,0,0);;
00269     case Eol_Green:
00270       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,0,138,0);;
00271     case Eol_Blue:
00272       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,0,0,138);;
00273     case Eol_Yellow:
00274       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,196,196,0);;
00275     case Eol_Orange:
00276       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,148,118,0);;
00277     case Eol_Violet:
00278       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,128,0,128);
00279     case Eol_Brown:
00280       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,100,64,4);
00281     case Eol_Grey:
00282       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,128,128,128);
00283     case Eol_DarkRed:
00284       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,64,0,0);
00285     case Eol_DarkGreen:
00286       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,0,64,0);
00287     case Eol_DarkBlue:
00288       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,0,0,64);
00289     case Eol_DarkYellow:
00290       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,60,60,0);
00291     case Eol_DarkOrange:
00292       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,64,56,0);
00293     case Eol_DarkViolet:
00294       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,60,0,60);
00295     case Eol_DarkBrown:
00296       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,56,32,2);
00297     case Eol_DarkGrey:
00298       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,64,64,64);
00299     case Eol_LightRed:
00300       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,255,32,32);
00301     case Eol_LightGreen:
00302       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,32,255,32);
00303     case Eol_LightBlue:
00304       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,32,32,255);
00305     case Eol_LightYellow:
00306       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,250,250,60);
00307     case Eol_LightOrange:
00308       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,255,234,30);
00309     case Eol_LightViolet:
00310       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,250,30,250);
00311     case Eol_LightBrown:
00312       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,200,100,32);
00313     case Eol_LightGrey:
00314       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,196,196,196);
00315     case Eol_Black:
00316       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,0,0,0);
00317     case Eol_White:
00318       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,255,255,255);
00319     case Eol_Tan:
00320       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,255,128,64);
00321     case Eol_Gold:
00322       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,255,245,30);
00323     case Eol_Silver:
00324       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,206,206,226);
00325     case Eol_YellowGreen:
00326       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,196,255,30);
00327     case Eol_Cyan:
00328       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,0,255,255);;
00329     case Eol_Magenta:
00330       return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,255,0,255);
00331   }
00332   return SDL_MapRGB(_eol_videobuffer->format,0,0,0);
00333 }
00334 
00335 void eol_frame_delay(eolUint delay)
00336 {
00337     static eolUint pass = 100;
00338     eolUint dif;
00339     dif = SDL_GetTicks() - pass;
00340     if(dif < delay)SDL_Delay( delay - dif);
00341     pass = SDL_GetTicks();
00342 }
00343 
00344 void eol_graphics_frame_begin()
00345 {
00346   glClear( GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT );
00347   glPushMatrix();
00348 }
00349 
00350 void eol_graphics_frame_end()
00351 {
00352   eolUint Then;
00353   eolUint delay;
00354 
00355   glPopMatrix();
00356   SDL_GL_SwapBuffers(); 
00357   eol_frame_delay(_eolGraphicsConfig.frameDelay);
00358   Then = _eol_graphics_NOW;
00359   _eol_graphics_NOW = SDL_GetTicks();
00360   if(_eolGraphicsConfig.trackFPS)
00361   {
00362     delay = _eol_graphics_NOW - Then;
00363     if (delay != 0)
00364     {
00365       _eol_graphics_FPS = 1000.0 / delay;
00366     }
00367   }
00368 }
00369 
00370 eolUint eol_graphics_get_now()
00371 {
00372   return _eol_graphics_NOW;
00373 }
00374 
00375 eolUint eol_graphics_get_pixel(SDL_Surface *surface, eolUint x, eolUint y)
00376 {
00377   /* Here p is the address to the pixel we want to retrieve*/
00378   Uint8 *p = (Uint8 *)surface->pixels + y * surface->pitch + x * surface->format->BytesPerPixel;
00379   if((x < 0)||(x >= surface->w)||(y < 0)||(y >= surface->h))return -1;
00380   switch(surface->format->BytesPerPixel)
00381   {
00382     case 1:
00383       return *p;
00384 
00385     case 2:
00386       return *(Uint16 *)p;
00387 
00388     case 3:
00389       if(SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN)
00390         return p[0] << 16 | p[1] << 8 | p[2];
00391       else
00392         return p[0] | p[1] << 8 | p[2] << 16;
00393 
00394     case 4:
00395       return *(Uint32 *)p;
00396 
00397   }
00398   return 0;       /*shouldn't happen, but avoids warnings*/
00399 }
00400 
00401 void eol_graphics_put_pixel(SDL_Surface *surface, eolUint x, eolUint y, eolUint pixel)
00402 {
00403   SDL_Rect point = {0,0,1,1};
00404   point.x = x;
00405   point.y = y;
00406   SDL_FillRect(surface,&point,pixel);
00407 }

00412 void eol_graphics_exit(void)
00413 {
00414   eol_logger_message(
00415     EOL_LOG_INFO,
00416     "eol_graphics: closing\n");
00417   _eolGraphicsInitialized = eolFalse;
00418   g_list_foreach(_eol_resize_callbacks, (GFunc)free, NULL);
00419   g_list_free(_eol_resize_callbacks);
00420   eol_logger_message(
00421     EOL_LOG_INFO,
00422     "eol_graphics: closed\n");
00423 }
00424 
00425 void eol_graphics_register_resize(void (*callback)(eolGraphicsView info))
00426 {
00427   eolGraphicsCallback *newCallback = NULL;
00428   if ((callback == NULL) ||
00429     (_eolGraphicsInitialized == eolFalse))
00430   {
00431     return;
00432   }
00433   newCallback = (eolGraphicsCallback *)malloc(sizeof(eolGraphicsCallback));
00434     newCallback->callback = callback;
00435   _eol_resize_callbacks = g_list_append(_eol_resize_callbacks,(void *)newCallback);
00436   callback(_eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView);
00437 }
00438 
00439 SDL_PixelFormat *eol_graphics_get_pixel_format()
00440 {
00441   if (!eol_graphics_initialized())
00442   {
00443     eol_logger_message(
00444       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00445       "eol_graphics:cannot get pixel format, graphics not initialized\n");
00446     return NULL;
00447   }
00448   return _eol_pixelFormat;
00449 }
00450 
00451 void eol_graphics_get_view(eolGraphicsView *view)
00452 {
00453   if (!eol_graphics_initialized())
00454   {
00455     eol_logger_message(
00456       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00457       "eol_graphics:cannot get view, graphics not initialized\n");
00458     return;
00459   }
00460   if (view == NULL)
00461   {
00462     eol_logger_message(
00463       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00464       "eol_graphics:cannot get view, passed a NULL view pointer\n");
00465     return;
00466   }
00467   /*TODO: make this thread safe*/
00468   memcpy(view,&_eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView,sizeof(eolGraphicsView));
00469 }

00471 eolFloat eol_graphics_get_FPS()
00472 {
00473   return _eol_graphics_FPS;
00474 }
00475 
00476 void eol_graphics_get_size(eolUint * w, eolUint * h)
00477 {
00478   if (w != NULL)*w = _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.xRes;
00479   if (h != NULL)*h = _eolGraphicsConfig.graphicsView.yRes;
00480 }
